mapper.select: SELECT id "id" ,auth_id "auth_id" , username "username" , password "password" , email "email" , name "name" , phone "phone" , age "age" , created_date "created_date" FROM member WHERE id= #{id}

SELECT id "id" ,auth_id "auth_id" , username "username" , password "password" , email "email" , name "name" , phone "phone" , age "age" , created_date "created_date" FROM member WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(auth_id,username, password, age, phone, name, email, provider,provider_id) VALUES(#{auth_id},#{username}, #{password}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{email},#{provider},#{provider_id})
